actionUnits.condition: Simulate OnTriggerEnter with a collider that does NOT have tag 'Objet1' or lacks SnapToTrigger, to cover the non-execution branch. MonoBehaviour 8870310304005890639 (GUID 5f8d06fe579502c4496842932d0afead) is DoorOpenScript with scene settings: BoxCollider isTrigger=1, openTrigger=1, myDoor bound to Animator (fileID 1075516723) via Prefab modification. Expect no animation, no deactivation, openTrigger remains true.

Simulate OnTriggerEnter with an entering collider tagged 'Objet1' that also has SnapToTrigger component. This should execute DoorOpenScript.OnTriggerEnter: call snap.Snap(transform.position), play Animator (fileID 1075516723) state 'DoorOpen', deactivate this GameObject, and set openTrigger=false.

Negative branch coverage for DoorOpenScript.OnTriggerEnter: invoke trigger enter with a collider NOT tagged 'Objet1' or without SnapToTrigger. Scene MonoBehaviour 8870310304005890639 (m_Script GUID 5f8d06fe579502c4496842932d0afead) is DoorOpenScript with settings from scene: BoxCollider isTrigger=1, openTrigger=true, myDoor bound to Animator (fileID 1075516723). Expect: inner if not executed, no SnapToTrigger call, no animation, GameObject remains active, openTrigger unchanged.

Positive branch coverage for DoorOpenScript.OnTriggerEnter with Cube_salle1: entering collider is Cube_salle1 (PrefabInstance 816818218) tagged 'Objet1' and has SnapToTrigger. Scene MonoBehaviour 8870310304005890639 (GUID 5f8d06fe579502c4496842932d0afead) corresponds to DoorOpenScript; Scene MonoBehaviour 5374773463603666079 (GUID 2723dba42bd113044ad231906b498006) corresponds to SnapToTrigger. Expect DoorOpenScript to call snap.Snap(transform.position), Animator (fileID 1075516723) plays 'DoorOpen', this collider_porte GameObject deactivates, and openTrigger set to false. SnapToTrigger.Snap disables XRGrabInteractable and XRGeneralGrabTransformer, moves/rotates Cube_salle1, freezes its Rigidbody, sets isSnapped=true; during the 2.0s window, SnapToTrigger.Update runs and applies RotateAroundLocal due to isSnapped=true.

room2 MonoBehaviour (fileID 697146254, guid 82aa235159f620648803cf53217af1e5) with doorAnim ref fileID 521131961. Partial-check scenario: call SetSphereCheck and SetCubeCheck only. Expect Update not to open the door since PyramidChecked remains false.
Complete-check scenario: after previous partial checks, call SetPyramidCheck so all three flags are true; on the next Update, since doorOpen was false, doorAnim.Play("DoorOpen") should run once.
Idempotency: after the door has opened, calling SetSphereCheck again should not retrigger opening because doorOpen is already true.

Simulate OnTriggerEnter on collider_porte (PrefabInstance fileID 1631101808) which has a Collider. Attached MonoBehaviour room2_trigger (fileID 1813076697, guid f90cc8c0ee6cc9746bf3259c5e5bf2bc) is configured with checkCube=true, checkSphere=false, checkPyramid=false and roomDatas -> Room 2 MonoBehaviour (fileID 697146254, guid 82aa235159f620648803cf53217af1e5). Scenario: a Cube-tagged object enters; expect roomDatas.SetCubeCheck to be invoked; door should remain closed until other checks are set.

Complete the room2 condition so the door opens. Room 2 MonoBehaviour (fileID 697146254, guid 82aa235159f620648803cf53217af1e5) has doorAnim -> fileID 521131961. After Cube check above, set Sphere and Pyramid checks; on the next Update, doorOpen flips true and doorAnim.Play("DoorOpen") should run once.

OnTriggerEnter simulation on collider_porte (PrefabInstance fileID 1339877303, has BoxCollider). Attached MonoBehaviour room2_trigger (fileID 1339877307, guid f90cc8c0ee6cc9746bf3259c5e5bf2bc) is configured with checkPyramid=true, checkSphere=false, checkCube=false and roomDatas -> Room 2 MonoBehaviour (fileID 697146254, guid 82aa235159f620648803cf53217af1e5). Expect roomDatas.SetPyramidCheck to be invoked; SnapToTrigger.Snap() would be called in runtime by OnTriggerEnter path.

Complete Room 2 checks to open the door. Room 2 MonoBehaviour (fileID 697146254, guid 82aa235159f620648803cf53217af1e5) has doorAnim -> fileID 521131961. After Pyramid check above, set Sphere and Cube checks; on the next Update, doorOpen becomes true and doorAnim.Play("DoorOpen",0,0) runs once.

OnTriggerEnter path for trigger_sphere: collider_porte PrefabInstance (fileID 1137377008) has BoxCollider. Attached MonoBehaviour room2_trigger (fileID 1137377012, guid f90cc8c0ee6cc9746bf3259c5e5bf2bc) is configured checkSphere=true, checkCube=false, checkPyramid=false; roomDatas -> Room 2 room2 MonoBehaviour (fileID 697146254, guid 82aa235159f620648803cf53217af1e5). Expect roomDatas.SetSphereCheck to be invoked; SnapToTrigger.Snap would be called in runtime.

Complete Room 2 checks so Update opens the door. After Sphere check above, set Cube and Pyramid checks; on the next Update, doorOpen becomes true and doorAnim (fileID 521131961) plays "DoorOpen" once.
